DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare cuff pressure cylindrical TaperGuard endotracheal tube laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cuff Pressure TaperGuard Cylindrical- Endotracheal Tube During Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty four participant assign one two group : cylindrical TaperGuard endotracheal tube . At supine position , cuff pressure endotracheal tube measure abdominal insufflation supine position . After insufflation head-up position ( 30Â° ) make cuff pressure record .
DOC.criteria: Participants underwent laparoscopic cholecystectomy American Society Anesthesiologists physical status 13 history respiratory disease , difficult intubation , morbid obesity ( body mass index 35 kg/m2 ) .
